languages.text: "Опасаешься, что теперь я буду плеваться на палубе и крыть твоих офицеров отборной бранью? Не стоит, шерин. Мне куда больше нравится быть в глазах окружающих принцессой, чем дезертиршей. Перед остальными я продолжу играть роль, но ты ведь хотел{mf||а} потолковать начистоту, вот я и не лицедействую".

"Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."
languages.original_text: "Опасаешься, что теперь я буду плеваться на палубе и крыть твоих офицеров отборной бранью? Не стоит, шерин. Мне куда больше нравится быть в глазах окружающих принцессой, чем дезертиршей. Перед остальными я продолжу играть роль, но ты ведь хотел{mf||а} потолковать начистоту, вот я и не лицедействую".

traits.locale_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."

traits.locale_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."

traits.locale_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Le preocupa que vaya a empezar a escupir en cubierta y a causar dolor a los delicados oídos de sus oficiales con mi lenguaje? Pues no, shereen. Prefiero que se me vea como a una princesa y no una desertora. Seguiré representando ese papel ante los demás, pero quería que hablara con sinceridad así que me he dejado de florituras».
languages.original_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."

traits.locale_text: «¿Le preocupa que vaya a empezar a escupir en cubierta y a causar dolor a los delicados oídos de sus oficiales con mi lenguaje? Pues no, shereen. Prefiero que se me vea como a una princesa y no una desertora. Seguiré representando ese papel ante los demás, pero quería que hablara con sinceridad así que me he dejado de florituras».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你是在担心我会在甲板上吐口水，用脏话震聋你手下军官的耳朵吗？别担心，亲爱的。我更喜欢别人把我当成公主，而不是逃兵。我会继续在其他人面前装腔作势，但既然你打算坦诚相见，那我就不装了。”
languages.original_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."

traits.locale_text: “你是在担心我会在甲板上吐口水，用我的脏话熏聋你手下军官的耳朵吗？别担心，亲爱的。我更喜欢别人把我当成公主，而不是逃兵。我会继续在其他人面前装腔作势，但既然你打算坦诚相见，那我就不装了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしがデッキに唾を吐いたり、あんたの士官たちの耳に恐ろしい話を吹き込んだりするとでも思ったのかい？心配いらないよ、シャリーン。あたしは脱走兵よりも王女様だと思われる方がいい。これからもその演技は続けるつもりさ。ただ、あんたがもっと気楽に話したそうだったから、いつもの自分に戻っただけよ」
languages.original_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしがデッキに唾を吐いたり、あんたの士官たちの耳に恐ろしい話を吹き込んだりするとでも思ったのかい？心配いらないよ、シャリーン。あたしは脱走兵よりも王女様だと思われる方がいい。これからもその演技は続けるつもりさ。ただ、あんたがもっと気楽に話したそうだったから、いつもの自分に戻っただけよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez peur que je me mette à cracher sur le pont et à casser les oreilles de vos officiers avec mes grossièretés ? Rassurez-vous, shereen, je préfère de loin passer pour une princesse plutôt que pour une déserteuse et je continuerai à jouer mon rôle devant les autres. Si j'ai tombé le masque, c'est uniquement parce que vous avez insisté pour jouer cartes sur table. »
languages.original_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez peur que je me mette à cracher sur le pont et à casser les oreilles de vos officiers avec mes grossièretés ? Rassurez-vous, shereen, je préfère de loin passer pour une princesse plutôt que pour une déserteuse et je continuerai à jouer mon rôle devant les autres. Si j'ai tombé le masque, c'est uniquement parce que vous avez insisté pour jouer cartes sur table. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Habt Ihr Angst, dass ich auf das Deck spucke und mit meiner schändlichen Zunge die Ohren Eurer Offiziere zum Schrumpfen bringe? Das müsst Ihr nicht, Shereen. Ich werde sehr viel lieber als Prinzessin gesehen denn als Deserteurin. Ich spiele vor anderen weiteren die Rolle, doch Ihr wolltet offen sprechen, also habe ich das Schauspielern eingestellt."
languages.original_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr Angst, dass ich auf das Deck spucke und mit meiner schändlichen Zunge die Ohren Eurer Offiziere zum Schrumpfen bringe? Das müsst Ihr nicht, Shereen. Ich werde sehr viel lieber als Prinzessin gesehen denn als Deserteurin. Ich spiele vor anderen weiteren die Rolle, doch Ihr wolltet Ihr offen sprechen, also habe ich das Schauspielern eingestellt."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."

languages.text: "Güverteye tükürmeye başlayıp küfürlerimle subaylarını yoldan çıkarmamdan mı endişeleniyorsun? Endişelenme şirinim. Bir asker kaçağındansa prenses olarak görülmeyi kesinlikle tercih ederim. Diğerlerinin önünde rolümü oynamaya devam edeceğim ancak sen açıkça konuşmak istedin, ben de rol kesmeyi bıraktım."
languages.original_text: "Are you worried I'm going to start spitting on the deck and shrivelling your officers' ears with my foul tongue? Don't be, shereen. I much prefer being seen as a princess rather than a deserter. I'll continue to play the part in front of the others, but you wanted to talk frankly, so I've dropped the act."

traits.locale_text: "Güverteye tükürmeye başlayacağımdan ve çirkin sözlerimle subaylarının kulaklarına zarar vereceğimden mi endişeleniyorsun? Endişelenme şirinim. Bir asker kaçağındansa bir prenses olarak görülmeyi kesinlikle tercih ederim. Diğerlerinin önünde rolümü oynamaya devam edeceğim ancak sen açıkça konuşmak istedin, ben de rol kesmeyi bıraktım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
